<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Employee Termination">b7f598d51b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcb9f</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:c8ef2a9a1baf9c10f5a3635bbc4bcb2b</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>disable-enable computer backup</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
	
	g_form.removeOption('data_backup_required', 'computer');

	
	/*
    if (g_form.getValue('computer') == 'yes') {
		enableOption('data_backup_required', 'computer');
		enableOption('data_backup_required', 'computer and email both');
    } else {
		disableOption('data_backup_required', 'computer');
		disableOption('data_backup_required', 'computer and email both');
    }*/

    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-06 14:33:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>13265c191b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcbd3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>disable-enable computer backup</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Termination Process Core">c5a5cfee1b9781108c5143f3cc4bcb64</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_13265c191b3d151062e50ed2cd4bcbd3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-09-06 14:33:24</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
